# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-80.0)
- Burner inserter (position x=39.5, y=-79.5) 
- Burner inserter (position x=41.5, y=-78.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)
Consists of following entities:
- Stone furnace (position x=60.0, y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5, y=-32.5)
Consists of following entities:
- Offshore pump (position x=106.5, y=-32.5)
- Boiler (position x=111.5, y=-32.0)
- Steam engine (position x=117.5, y=-30.5)
- Pipe group (position x=107.5, y=-34.5)
- Pipe group (position x=105.5, y=-32.5)

### Transport belt system at position(x=40.5, y=-83.5)
Consists of following entities:
- Belt group (position x=40.5, y=-83.5)
- Transport belt (position x=63.5, y=-53.5)
- Transport belt (position x=64.5, y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when entities have no fuel
- Ensure that entities which require fuel have a sufficient fuel supply before operating.
### Errors when entities have no ingredients
- Ensure that entities which require ingredients have a sufficient ingredient supply before operating.
### Errors when entities are not connected
- Ensure that entities which require connection to other entities are properly connected before operating.
### Errors when entities are not plugged into the electric network
- Ensure that entities which require an electric network connection are properly plugged in before operating.
### Errors when pipe groups are empty
- Ensure that pipe groups have a sufficient fluid supply before operating.
### Errors when belt groups are empty
- Ensure that belt groups have a sufficient item supply before operating.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent. 
No important variables have been assigned.
